base_info.name: Yalong Liu
base_info.brief_tag:
Master Student at Xidian University, China
Deep Learning; Medical image processing
Email: jamesliu2248@gmail.com
base_info.brief_intro: I'm a third-year Master student in the Department of Electronic Engineering, Xidian University, Xian, China. I work at the Visual Information Processing Lab(VIP Lab) under the supervision of Prof. Jie Li. My research interests include Deep Learning, Image segmentation, Medical image processing, Computer Vision, Artificial Intelligence, etc.

news: 10/2019: One paper was submitted to ISBI2020 (TS CNN).
09/2019: 2019 National Scholarship for Master, Xidian University
06/2019: One paper got accepted by Journal of Computer Applications (Here).
05/2019: One paper got accepted by MICCAI2019 (RS R-CNN)
04/2019: One paper got accepted by CCML2019 (Here).
09/2018: The National Third Prize in Imagine Cup 2018 Microsoft 'Innovation Cup' Global Student Technology Competition-China Finals.
07/2018: School Silver Award in The 3rd China College Students' Internet Plus Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition.
04/2018: 2018 Data Science Bowl, Kaggle, Rating: 347/3634 top 10%.
09/2017: I started my Master life at Xidian University.
10/2015: The National Second Price in 2015 National Undergraduate Electronics Design Contest.
10/2014: First-Class Undergraduate Scholarship, Lanzhou Jiaotong University.
09/2013: I started my Bachelor life at Lanzhou Jiaotong University.

publications.name: tscnn
publications.pop_info: A Deep Learning method to segment punctate white matter lesions (PWMLs).
publications.info:
Trident Segmentation CNN: A Spatiotemporal Transformation CNN for Punctate White Matter Lesions Segmentation in Preterm Neonates
Yalong Liu, Jie Li, Miaomiao Wang, Zhicheng Jiao, Jian Yang, and Xianjun Li
Paper(Submitted to arXiv), Code;

publications.name: rsrcnn
publications.pop_info: A two stage deep learning method to segment punctate white matter lesions (PWMLs) in neonates
publications.info:
Refined Segmentation R-CNN: A Two-stage Convolutional Neural Network for Punctate White Matter Lesion Segmentation in Preterm infants
Yalong Liu, Jie Li, Ying Wang, Miaomiao Wang, Xianjun Li, Zhicheng Jiao, and Xingbo Gao
Paper (Accepted by MICCAI2019), Code;

publications.name: resunet
publications.pop_info: To segment punctated white matter lesion in preterm infants
publications.info:
Segmentation of Punctated White Matter Lesion in Preterm Infants Based on Refined Deep Residual U-Net
Yalong Liu, Jie Li, Yin Wang, Saifei Wu, and Pei Zou
Paper(Chinese) (Accepted by CCML2019, then be transfered to Journal of Computer Applications);
